/** * @name isBigInt * @summary Tests for a `BigInt` object instance. * @description * Checks to see if the input object is an instance of `BigInt` * @example *
* * ```javascript * import { isBigInt } from '@polkadot/util'; * * console.log('isBigInt', isBigInt(123_456n)); // => true * ``` */ export function isBigInt(value) { return typeof value === 'bigint'; }
